channel.title: 317 Delta Help Request
channel.description:
[u]I'm learning to code [color=brown]RSPS[/color] and I wanna start my own server. The source I've choose is [color=navy]Delta[/color], for beginners lol. But for the life of me I cant figure out why my [color=purple]NPC[/color]'s wont spawn or anything. I have [color=teal]Team Viewer[/color] if someone is willing to help me out.[/u]
Link To my client.java, npc.java, and npchandler.java https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BynpWmR4WjqtUWN6a0NXODBJanc&usp=sharing

item.title: 317 Delta Help Request
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“arean1, post:4, topic:550347”][quote author=ohokay link=topic=669257.msg4475488#msg4475488 date=1425609481]
delta? we back in 2007 or?
[/quote]

Shut up you fool. I hate the children like you who say this sort of trash. 2007 was RuneScape’s peak, therefore people (including me) enjoy creating servers with that nostalgic feel to it. Any server can be good if it is in the right hands, delta is no exception.[/quote]

It was also a time when absolutely horrendous rsps were written.

We are now in 2015 where some users have spent the time completely re-writing the rsps base to make it a lot more efficient and making it a lot easier to use… Using a base that old now would not even be worth your time for the amount of bugs that you’d have to fix.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Delta Help Request
item.dc:creator: @arean1 arean1
item.description:
@arean1 wrote:

Do you mean you are trying to place an NPC somewhere? In which case there is a .cfg file for that, usually called autospawn.cfg.

Read full topic
